page.title: 15EMPLOYMENT IN CHOPGATE.
page.content: What our families do for a living. There are twenty one families in our school and thirty one children. Six of our families are farmers.Five of these farmers keep sheep and one keeps pigs.All the farmers keep cattle but only two farmers sell milk to the Milk Marketing Board.The milk is collected by a milk tanker.Ten families who are not farmers keep some farm stock.Seven dads work in Bilsdale and fourteen dads have to work away.Most of our dads work in Stokesley,Stockton or Middlesbrough area. Other occupatians are one policeman, one fireman, five mechanics, one pilot, one teacher, one shipping agent, one building contractor, one health expert, two chemists and one office worker.
